text: Yellow flower of Ouratea hexasperma Ouratea is a genus of flowering plants in the family (Ochnaceae). Species include: * Ouratea amplectens * Ouratea boliviana Van Tieghem * Ouratea brevicalyx * Ouratea cocleensis * Ouratea confertiflora (Pohl) Engl. * Ouratea elegans * Ouratea gigantophylla (Erhard) Engl. * Ouratea insulae * Ouratea jamaicensis * Ouratea megaphylla Sastre * Ouratea patelliformis * Ouratea quintasii * Ouratea schusteri * Ouratea superba Engl. * Ouratea tumacoensis * Ouratea wallnoeferiana Sastre ==References== Category:Malpighiales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ouratea
